data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The purpose of IO::NonBlocking is to provide a ready made server
    service as IO::Multiplex does. Whilst IO::Multiplex gives high-level
    programmer I/O multiplexing servers, IO::NonBlocking gives
    non-blocking I/O server base class to be inherited. So, it should be
    designated as the name.
